title: WebView sub/popup/multi-window handling improvement
body: Please implement possibility for developer to handle (popup) window user flow. This is mainly useful for OAuth 3rd party authentication that is typically not under control of a developer.

comments.body:
This is a big pain for us, typically Facebook comments plugin uses Popup window for login, but there is no way how to detect the login has succeeded in the new window - when to close it.
I've also logged other WebView issues in my blogpost:
https://www.suchan.cz/2016/04/make-webview-great-again/

Thank you.
As a small note, existing solution for Hosted Web App seems not to function correctly either.
For example, create a HWA with url https://wpdev.uservoice.com/forums/110705-universal-windows-platform/filters/my_feedback and try log in with Google. Log in popup is displayed, but after login the site displays in new window (compared to being displayed in original window as expected and as works in a browser).
